name: AS_GSS_ENTRYPOINT_LOGIC_isExposeGcwIntegration
description: The entry point for the rule AS_GSS_BL_exposeGcwIntegration. Holds the visibility/conditions for the users who can interact with the GCW integration in GSS.
sail_code:
/*Holds the visibility/conditions for the users who can interact with the GCW integration on the front end in GSS*/
rule!AS_GSS_BL_exposeGcwIntegration()
